short_description: 【High-Quality Metal Cable Management Under Desk】The under desk cable management contains two U-shaped channels cord organizer for desk crafted from pure metal, offering a high-end texture and robust, stable construction. This under desk organizer is undoubtedly the optimal solution for under desk cable management

【Two Mounting Options】Our desk cable management comes with two mounting options: 1. Tape installation, which requires no tools and supports up to 4 lbs; 2. Screw installation, offering a firmer hold with a load capacity of up to 11 lbs. Select the mounting method that best suits your needs

【Attention Please】If you choose tape mounting, please note the following three points: 1. To ensure better adhesion of the cable management tray, please make sure to clean the surface before use, the tape should only be applied to clean, dust-free, smooth and flat surfaces; the desk cord organizer is not suitable for dirty, mildewed or peeling surfaces. When installing the cable management under desk with the tape, press firmly for 10 seconds; 2. After installing the under desk cable management, wait 24 hours for the tape to fully cure before placing cables; 3. Make sure the tape is flat and free of wrinkles, which may cause the cord organizer for desk to fall off

【Extensive Accessory Sets】: Each set of our desk cable management includes 2 U-shaped under desk organizer, 6 cable ties, 8 screws, 2 single-hole cable holders and 4 four-hole cable holders, as well as 1 roll of strong adhesive tape, all-around to meet your wires, cables, and plugs storage needs.Delamu under desk cable management tray is the optimum solution to your cable management problems, ideally for keeping your work desk, home office desk, or gaming table neat and orderly

【Innovative Design for Heat Dissipation】The U channel desk cord organizer has 3 pre-drilled holes and multiple grooves and perforations, which not only facilitates the placement of plugs and cords, but also promotes heat dissipation of the equipment. These under desk cable management systems are suitable for different types of desks, including standing desks, adjustable desks, lift desks, glass desks, L-shaped desks, gaming tables and other common workspaces
